Instructions.Value: The Sabaku Kaze or Desert Wind was based on the ancient Age of War Azami Sand Devil design, and became a premier reconnaissance vehicle of its time. The hovercraft was highly popular with Azami warriors and their Combine commanders. It was prized for the high speed attacks that it could make on its targets. Hover: Fast on open ground and water, slow in rough terrain, not very agile, cannot move through woods. Movement: 9/14 Hex: 270/480 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 175 25 Left 135 25 Right 135 25 Rear 100 25 Turret 135 25 Total 680 125
